title: Faithful In The Routine | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Faithful In The Routine | Joel Osteen
description:
We all have to pass the test of being faithful when life feels ordinary. It’s easy to feel stuck in the midst of routine, but behind the scenes, God is preparing you for the incredible things He wants to do in your life.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
